name.ja: タブグループエディター

short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Save and manage groups of tabs
short.de: Speichern und verwalten Sie Gruppen von Tabs
short.es: Guarda y gestiona grupos de pestañas
short.fr: Sauvegardez et gérez des groupes d'onglets
short.it: Salva e gestisci gruppi di schede
short.ja: タブのグループを保存・管理します

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Group Editor: Streamline Your Browsing Experience

Effortlessly organize and manage your browser tabs with Tab Group Editor. This powerful extension allows you to create, edit, and save groups of tabs, helping you stay organized and boost your productivity.

Key Features:
• Create custom tab groups: Easily group related tabs together for better organization.
• Save and restore: Save your tab groups and restore them later, even after closing your browser.
• Quick access: Quickly switch between different tab groups with just a click.
• Edit on the fly: Add or remove tabs from existing groups as your needs change.
• Context menu integration: Conveniently add tabs to groups or remove them using the right-click menu.
• Multi-language support: Enjoy a localized experience with support for multiple languages.

Whether you're a student juggling research projects, a professional managing multiple tasks, or simply someone who loves an organized browsing experience, Tab Group Editor is the perfect tool to keep your digital workspace clean and efficient.

Take control of your tabs today and experience a more organized way of browsing with Tab Group Editor!
